website_summaries.verdict: Dual micro USB capabilities allows you to charge 2 times faster.
pros: Comes with 2 micro USB cables and a travel pouch
Has the ability to charge 3 devices at the same time
cons: This is the most expensive item on our list

customer_reviews.title: Recharges very slowly, BUT ANKER took care of the problem promptly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack charges multiple devices but it takes 12-15 hours to recharge itself-even when it's plugged into a double outlet as the instructions indicate. UPDATE!! 11-16-2017. After posting this review, I immediately received an email from Julia at ANKER CUSTOMER SERVICE SUPPORT. She verified my problem and asked if they could send a REPLACEMENT unit for my trial. I, of course said "yes." The replacement arrived promptly along with continued emails inquiring about progress and results. THE NEW UNIT IS PERFECT!!! It fully recharges in less than 6.5 hours from the double input plugs. I couldn't be happier with ANKER and their product. It does EVERYTHING they claim and more!! And Julia deserves a raise and a promotion...
customer_reviews.author: frog

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, 9months later it’s horrible!
customer_reviews.text: 9-month review. At first I LOVED this portable charger. Here we are 9 months later and I’ve noticed such a huge decrease in performance. I charge it to full charge and it only charges my iPhone 7 Plus about 3 times. The charger would last at least 7-9 charges before now I’m lucky with 3. It’s ridiculous. Definitely not dependable at all long term. ***edit they have sent me a replacement. Very easy to communicate with and willing to stand behind product. I will charge it and use and update after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Sara813

customer_reviews.title: A UTTER WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, I was charging my iPad this past weekend when all of a sudden I smell something burning, I check around and find that my iPad is literally burning up and smoke is coming out of it, then my screen goes pitch black. This product completely destroyed my new iPad Pro!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this device! Won’t fully charge...
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I bought this battery a few days ago in preparation of my upcoming international trip. Unfortunately, this device only charged half-way after being plugged into my wall for over ten hours. I am very disappointed in my purchase because I am a frequent Amazon shopper and this is my first dud. I even tried to plug it into the wall in my office at work to see if it would charger any further but to no avail. I am leaving for my international flight in the morning and without a functional device.
customer_reviews.author: Plenty Ink

customer_reviews.title: but it works perfectly fine for me and if it doesnt or it breaks
customer_reviews.text: i know people will look at the one star reviews to see whats wrong with the product, but it works perfectly fine for me and if it doesnt or it breaks? go to anker.com support and tell them your ploblem, it might take a couple days to respond but they'll respond and get your problem fixed, personally i didnt even have to send my old battery back to them to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: mason_water

customer_reviews.title: Have three of these - just bought a 4th
customer_reviews.text: Recent one will not charge. Also, outside material appears cheaper which is never a good sign. Plug it in to charge and the first blue light flashes, then the second blue light ALSO flashes at the same time. Should be sequential not both flashing. It NEVER charged even after ten hours plugged into the same charger I use for the other three I own. Very disappointed as I am going back in the hospital and use these for charging iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the headache
customer_reviews.text: Something that is include with this item is an 18 month warranty. My item stopped working within those 18 months. They refused to replace the item and only give me a small discount towards the purchase of another item. This is the second time I've had issues with a warranty with them. The first time they straight up ignored my messages until my warranty period was up so that they didn't have to send replacements on items.
customer_reviews.author: Katira Santiago

customer_reviews.title: We love this one already
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Anker power charger. We have phones for business uses and these are a necessity for us. The other three are the next lower amp hr but I tried this model for more power and I can charge it from TWO USB outlet cords at the same time, thereby cuts the charge time in half. Charges my phone about 8 times. We love this one already, just like our other Anker chargers. We may be out all day and we'd never be able to keep the phones working efficiently without these portable chargers. Most people really could use one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: No convenience for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's wrong but all I know that this was a waste of my money. I don't know if I didn't understand this device or what. I have a Samsung 8 and it takes all day to charge my phone. What gives I want my money back. But it's past the time I can do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this a few weeks ago and for whatever ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few weeks ago and for whatever reason it will not take a full charge. I've bought a number of Anker products in the past with no issues. This was a pricey purchase and it doesnt work...
customer_reviews.author: Luke Walczyk

customer_reviews.title: Drains after few uses
customer_reviews.text: Have owned multiple Anker products over the years. This device has not worked to its full potential - within the first year it would drain after two iPhone charges, then it was less and less. Until now, almost a year and a half after purchase date it has stopped working. I have had excellent experience with other Anker products. Very disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Just over a month of use and already the USB ...
customer_reviews.text: Just over a month of use and already the USB ports are inconsistent as to whether they’re going to charge your phone or not. Really wish there was a quality control with Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: MB23

customer_reviews.title: No more searching for power outlets!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many small portable chargers that were either cheap or free, and after a long time of being frustrated at how quickly they died, I purchased this charger. I wish I'd never wasted my time with all the cheaper options, because this charger is very reliable and has enough power to charge my phone numerous times. I ended up plugging cords into all five of the spaces (two for charging and one for each of my phone, headset, and watch), and I charge everything with this one device now. A few pieces of velcro keep all the cords neatly organized, and the whole thing simplifies my life a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cassimie

customer_reviews.title: charging is Very SLOW terrible
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack charges multiple devices but it takes more then 24 hours to recharge itself-even when it's plugged into a double outlet as the instructions indicate
customer_reviews.author: Weber

customer_reviews.title: Broke Very Easily
customer_reviews.text: When I dropped this battery once while it was still in its travel bag, it stopped working immediately. I did not even drop it from very high off the ground. I am not sure if this case charges effectively. All I know is that this case is very delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Failed in less than a year in. Batteries will not charge further than 30% I tried charging on three different power sources all not charging past 30%
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Changing this to 3 stars from 1 because Anker sent a new one very quickly and their customer service was great! The second device I received has not had any issues. Loved it at first, but two weeks in it already won't charge more than half way (2 blue lights). I'm very disappointed in how fast it stopped charging all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product hard to charge.
customer_reviews.text: Great when you’re away from an outlet or just don’t want to be tied down. Comes with a very nice carrying bag and stays charged. Only complaint is charging can get frustrating as it seems to need a more robust/stronger charge (iPhone/Apple bricks did NOT work every time). So I definitely recommend using both charging cables simultaneously to speed up the process & find out sooner wether It’s charging (Sometimes the light will flash to charge but no charge). So definitely use/find a strong/powerful brick for charging and all should go well. As crazy as this may sound, for the price I’m not upset at all and as long as this product keeps working I’m a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Jnx

customer_reviews.title: Issues after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing until the last couple of weeks. I'm flight crew and this thing has saved my life so many times. Charges my phone 6xs before needing a recharge. However the last couple of weeks it isn't charging up all the way. Not sure what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D Lebert

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE !!
customer_reviews.text: I've had and pitched several portable chargers. NOT UNTIL THIS ONE, have I been completely happy. The double power inputs using the provided AC wall receptacle connectors allow for quick, complete charging in a flash, and with the three USB ports, you can charge three dead electronics such as phone, laptop, tablet etc. in unbelievably fast time. Better yet is the capacity this unit holds, and it holds the charge for days if you don't use it. Yeah, it's a little bigger, a little heavier, and a little more expensive, but I am TOTALLY HAPPY with the performance, and I would buy it again. BEST CHARGER ON THE MARKET FOR THE MONEY !!
customer_reviews.author: DR4PULP

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes like 24 hours to charge . Is huge . I haven’t tried it out for battery power because this thing is still charging a day later . Yes are used a second USB cable and charger - I thought maybe it was the cable . Nope . If if if the battery holds a long charge then it would be a good emergency back up battery for a car. Not something you carry around Everywhere considering they have battery chargers 1/10 the size that probably do the same thing .
customer_reviews.author: John Marovic

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have a glitch
customer_reviews.text: Ok it’s not what I expected. It seems to have a glitch where when I plug in a phone to be charged, the lights on the unit come on however my phone does not charge. It’s happened quite a number of times. My phone it presently plugged in while writing this review n still no juice. The charger is fully charged btw.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Peters

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, can not insert the USP connector
customer_reviews.text: I spent almost $80 to buy this charger and it does not work properly, it's impossible to charge using one of the USB ports. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Chohfi

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't fully charge out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in to charge when first got it. It seemed to be stuck on the second light for about 20 hours. Finally switched over to the third light. Sat "charging" on the third of four lights for another 48 hours and never progressed further. Using both charging ports didn't make a difference. Used variety of wall chargers: 5W, 12W, and 18W apple chargers. Wouldn't even charge at all with the 18W charger. Expected better from Anker.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Silver

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding service from Anker
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review to compliment the excellent service that I received from Anker when my charging battery had a problem charging. I may have worked with a few Anker employees but Luann was extremely prompt and helpful throughout. I am especially impressed with Anker's prompt and courteous responses. Together, we attempted a couple of solutions without success. They suggested I shipped the battery back to them and to inform them when I had shipped it. I did and they next day they informed they had shipped a replacement battery and the tracking number. I will stay with Anker and order their Elite USB Charger. John M. Devlin Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds power for a week and good for faster recharge and charging multiple i phones
customer_reviews.text: Took about 5 hours for first time charge. The unit came with just one indicator light going on when placed for charging. I have charged I phone 6s plus about 5 times now and the power bank still has 2 indicator lights on. It will probably last for 2 to 3 more charges. It has held the charge well. It is a little heavy for carrying around everyday but great for charging multiple items over period of days. I used my I phone 12 W power adapters and lightning cables for charging. It worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sheela V.

customer_reviews.title: 2 USB ports died after a month of infrequent usage.
customer_reviews.text: 2 USB ports died after a month of rare usage (I only charged the battery 2-3 times a week). Not sure if this is a defect or this is how their product works... #Update: They contacted me and asked what's wrong with the product; then guess what..? They ignored my response and my following-up attempts. Thank you for "great" customer service, Anker. I bought a lot of stuff from Anker (chargers, ipad holders, cables..), now I have to switch to another vendor. New buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Don Ngo

customer_reviews.title: I fly for work a great deal and while more airports are improving their outlet\USB ...
customer_reviews.text: If you travel a lot this is will serve you quite well. I fly for work a great deal and while more airports are improving their outlet\USB offerings, this device is AMAZING if you need to charge something in a pinch! Pros: Exceptional quality Charges my iPhone 8 faster than an outlet charge Takes a long time to use up the power and seems to retain its charge almost indefinitely. Cons: A bit heavy (not a surprise) Lately has been causing my laptop back to be pulled over by TSA scanning at airports.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart, NYC

customer_reviews.title: Updated to 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff is the battery capacity is great. Problem I have is that 2 of the 3 ports do not work. And it does take quite a long time to charge up even with the dual cables connected. That one I can live with. Not sure what to do about the ports not working, hopefully support will chime in here. Thanks Update, feedback from seller indicated to fully charge for 6 1/2 hours and try these issues again. Working great, all 3 plugs are good. Upgrading my review to 5 stars. Thanks...this is about my 5th Anker product and have always been happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mcateer

customer_reviews.title: Paid $40 for it
customer_reviews.text: If you need this size, then you need this size. As to be expected, it's heavy. My two boys hook up their Nintendo Switches and it keeps them going for a long time. It does take time to re-charge it, but hopefully that's far and in between, and after-all, should be expected. As with all the Anker products i own, 5 *. They work and are reliable. With all the electronics that need usb charging these days, buy yourself a multi-socket that can fit a few, and charge this unit with both inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Bmacker

customer_reviews.title: Equal to the 13000 and double the price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for about 2 months now, and I can say that while it works well, I have documented how long it lasts and how long it takes to charge against my old ANKER portable charger (the 13000 one) and this charger is pretty much the same. It charges my phone the same amount of times, and it takes about the same time to charge. Does it work? Yes Is it better? No Is it twice as expensive? Yes For it being around double the price of the 13000, I would expect it to at least last a bit longer. Maybe I got a defective model, but I would look elsewhere for a long lasting charger.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Anker is quality
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Anker because I can count on their quality every time. This bank is larger and slightly heavier than the cheaper brand/unbranded ones on Amazon. The great thing about this bank is that it offers two power inputs for charging up the bank. Twice the inputs means it charges in under 6 hours. When your buying a battery bank you’ll be using in your house you have too be able to trust in the brand that made it. Anker is unsurpassed in quality. I sleep soundly while charging my Anker.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Out of warranty, still got a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in April 2018. Didn't use it for a few months because I didn't have a need until then. I used it sparingly, only charging the pack about 3 times. When I went for a trip this thanksgiving, I noticed only one port was functional. I called anker and explained my situation. I was just shy of being two months out of warranty. Adam from anker was able to send me a replacement free of charge. I even get to keep my faulty one. The replacement won't be covered under a warranty but at least I will get a brand new replacement. Their customer service is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kiyoshi Nava

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine on first charge, then......ungh!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this along with an Anker solar panel. It charged once in the sun and that was great. A week later I tried to recharge it again with solar in full sunlight for many hours, repositioning every few hrs for maximum exposure for 3 days and... nothing. Couldn’t even get the first indicator light on. I fear this new battery is malfunctioning, now I’ve had it plugged into an outlet for 8 hrs and it’s still trying to get the 2nd indicator light. Is this normal? Going to contact Anker for help. Maybe they can do something for me.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Gangsta

customer_reviews.title: I cannot live without it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing since 2017. I LOVE it. Charges in about 6-7 hours and charges my phone multiple times. I like having the peace of mind my phone isn't going to die halfway through the day since I'm bad about forgetting to charge it at night. It has traveled internationally with me as well as gone on camping and fishing trips. I didn't get questioned by TSA if that's a concern for you, just pull it out and put it with your laptop. My only gripe is that it is a little cumbersome/heavy but that's to be expected for the amount of power this thing stores. Of all the other power banks I've tried this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is not good. It has been on the charger for 16 hours and the last dot for fully charged is still blinking even with having dual cables attached. Advertisement says two cables should charge within 6 hours so obviously I have a defective unit or maybe one that has sat in the inventory shelf too long. I would like to talk with someone at the company and get an exchange so I can review a working model.
customer_reviews.author: coboblack

customer_reviews.title: This power core worked once. It was not at ...
customer_reviews.text: This power core worked once. It was not at all what was expected. I had to continue to charge it to even get a 50% charge on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 6 day camping/festival trip to keep 2 phones charged through the week. We made it to the end of day 4 before we needed to juice it back up, which I had expected to happen on day 3. We like it so much that we bought a second one to rotate between the two. The original one we purchased is still going strong, and it’s about 3 years old now being used at least once a week. It is larger than some others out there, but works great for our needs and can charge 3 things simultaneously and still last for days.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Anker is my #1, always
customer_reviews.text: Thank you again for yet another well to put high quality product at a great cost. If I wasn’t such a clutz I would still be holding onto the first one I bought instead of losing it heh. But nevertheless a loyal Anker supporter through and through. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely the last portable charger you are ever gonna need. I charged my Galaxy s10+ 3 full times and my friend's phones. It takes so much to kill this thing. The only thing is that it takes long af to charge. So if yur not gonna leave it in overnight, you probably wanna get the updated onces that charge your phones and the portable charger itself faster. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nirobi Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not performing as it should.
customer_reviews.text: I think mine has some batteries that are bad or something. It shows full charge but it barely changed my iPhone XR. It goes from full to dead just trying to charge my phone once. It should charge a phone more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee P.

customer_reviews.title: Too slow....
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like tbis charger, well made. Anker is solid. However takess at least 2 days to charge with single usb. Maybe defective? Cant use it with solar for sure...
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy during a natural disaster.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida and bought this at the last minute before hurricane Irma. Amazingly, we actually got it before the hurricane arrived and we charged it ahead of the hurricane. After the power went out, it was a lifesaver. We were able to keep our cell phones charged so that we could let family & friends know that we were okay, as well as keep in contact with coworkers and friends. That is incredibly important during natural disasters. We plan to have this to use during all hurricanes in the future. Great product and thank you for the extra speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: C Kurt Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Power when I needed it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger, 26800mAh External Battery with Dual Input Port and Double-Speed Recharging and the Anker Quick Charge 3.0 39W Dual USB Wall Charger on August 30, I live in Florida and Hurricane Irma arrived less than a week after receiving both products. They were able to keep 3 cellphones charged for the 5 days my neighborhood was without power. I recommend both of these products. The storage capacity of the portable charger was fantastic, for the time it was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Charger I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Old Anker was starting to show it's age, slow to charge, not holding as much, perhaps a little small for my needs. I bought it during the Pokemon Go craze for a deal. This one blows it out of the water, charges my electronics quick and efficient, great to plug in my headlamp, phone and watch on my way to go running and find everything usable and the battery almost full by the time i get to the trial. The only thing that drains the battery with any force is the iPad, but even that is acceptable. Dual charging makes it so this charges quick. Anker makes a quality product and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: No quick charging on this model.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery thinking it would charge my Note 5 by fast charging and it does not. I must have missed something in the description. Now, I see there's another 26800 that does fast charging Qualcomm 3.0. Just not happy, but like the capacity.
customer_reviews.author: abrams3

customer_reviews.title: Mega power station
customer_reviews.text: I took this traveling on my carry on. Yes its heavy for a pocket, but it came in handy while we had a lay over. I was able to charge my wife phone, our gand daughters phone and my phone all at the same time. In about 30 min, we simotaneously charged them all from below -25% power up to all at 85%. It does take a while to charge from USB computer port, but it last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Philip E. Kochis

customer_reviews.title: No longer wants to fully charge.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Company contacted me and sent me a replacement. A+ Customer service. Will upgrade to 3 stars and update review if charger works. Purchased this September 14, 2017 and it no longer wants to charge past 3/4 lights. Tried it on multiple computers and wall chargers. No idea why it's doing this but I am very disappointed in this. I expected more from this company. I bought it after Hurricane Irma and was hoping to use it during future Hurricanes but can't trust it now.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Great Charging Solution
customer_reviews.text: Love using this when power outlets are hard to come by. I use this to charge my GoPro batteries when I’m riding my Harley and need to keep the GoPro going. I also use it in emergencies when the power goes out. I’ve charged my iPhone up all week (about 5 times) and still had power left over. I think it dropped to 1 dot or maybe 2. But this battery does more than I need it to. I do recommend buying the Anker dual USB charging block to charge since this bank has two mini usb inputs for charging. Can charge with one, but takes much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: 2 years old and still kicking
customer_reviews.text: So with all the new technology out there I am still using this Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger. It holds its charge very well over long periods of not being used. It charges my Galaxy S7 very quickly and and can recharge it several times on one charge. It works great on my other devices as well and best of all it has lasted for 2 years now and is still working as well as the day I bought it. So if you want a portable charger that not only works well but lasts then this is it. I don't usually write reviews like this but good is good and should be recognized.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Power for days.
customer_reviews.text: Do you need a power brick with lots of juice, which will charge your phone or tablet over and over and which will hold a charge for weeks in between uses? Then buy this. It charges up quickly. It stays fully charged for weeks just sitting there waiting to be used. And when you finally do need it this thing will charge your phone, your tablet, whatever you need, as many times as you will realistically need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 month Review - 5 star worthy?
customer_reviews.text: This product is no longer charging to its full capacity and it’s overheating. It literally is now taking up to 24 hours to charge and it doesn’t fill up all the way! I was hoping it would last longer than most of my other chargers because of the price, but it seems Anker has disappointed me once again. *Update* 6-24-19 Anker contacted me with urgent notice to solve my issue with the charger. The new charger seems to be working well, but I’m still testing out the charge time as my original had an issue of prolonged charging. I will come back with an update on the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brand and product!
customer_reviews.text: Always bought Anker products, earphones, power banks. This is an excellent item, especially if you're a backpack traveler like me. I've been pushing this thing to its limit to run it dry, but man, I've gotta say I'm impressed. I charge my drone, 2 phones with this bad boy, plus enough juice for my fiancée's phone. Hasn't let me down, and definitely won't. I previously owned another anker power bank which i had for a solid 6 years. The batteries started to show signs of wearing finally and that is why i chose anker. Simply the best products at the best price. Also, i bought this on 40% off on a lightning deal! Total 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It was great for 6 month now it's dead.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was super impressed with this power bank. It rarely needed a recharge, it has multiple charging points, and it really charged devices fast! Unfortunately 6 months later (using it maybe once or twice a week), it won't take a charge anymore. The input also feels physical loose and struggles to make a good connection even with brand new cables. The battery life was so good I probably only recharged it 10-15x times in 6 months, and yet that's all it took to break it. What a disappointment this was!
customer_reviews.author: Photonic

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge up / charging box gets HOT
customer_reviews.text: Will not charge beyond the third flashing light and by this point (two nights of being plugged in 10+ hours) and the charging box plugged into the wall is HOT. Tried different boxes each night. Waste of $ :(. Scared to plug anything in to it because I don’t want to ruin anything
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This product works very nicely. I am impressed with the number of times I can charge my phone. There is one thing I don't like and that is the mesh bag is very slick and if not sinched closed the batter slides out. Unfortunately once I didn't notice it sliding out and it fell, got some good scratches on it now. It would help if the inside of the mesh bag were a little course.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Cables would not fit and poor design
customer_reviews.text: My usb cables would not insert into the battery pack, it felt too forceful. It appears that the plastic tongue where the contacts are seated is too large. This was with an apple lightning cable. Also the battery pack has 2 usb micro ports for charging which is a wasted resource; you have to carry two usb micro cables which takes up space and both my charge ports when traveling. This device can output 6 amps but only charges at 2 amps, 4 if you plug in a second cable. I think a usb c capable device would be preferred over this. I gave a second star for durability. It feels like a brick, so it is useful for something.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: One of the best powerbanks you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank and can keep your phone charged for a week or so. I just bought this one for my Mom since her phone is always running low and she loves it. I've had mine for almost 2+ years now and it still performs like a champ. Ever since I've tried Anker powerbanks, I've never gone back to previous brands.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Anker will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Anker will not disappoint. Their products are always well made, and they stand behind the warranty. I've had a few defects in various products, and they've been replaced quickly and without a fight. They have my loyalty as a result. I especially love this charge bank. It's got plenty of juice to recharge several phones, several times. It's been a lifesaver during travel. Wish I'd bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to charge
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a while ago. Have been frustrated for so long I had to write a review. The “fast charging” forces you to have to use two inputs. If you do not use both inputs, it takes over 28-32 hours to charge on a single input. I also purchased another anker power bank 20800 I believe that has one input and it recharges itself much faster on a single input and recharges my devices about 2-3 more times than this one. I would not recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Less than a Month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in January, and broke two days ago - about a month after purchase. One of the USB charging ports fell off (just pushed into the case when I was plugging in a standard iPhone charging cable). Now the battery will not recharge and none of the charging ports work. Pretty disappointed in the quality. I’d maybe expect something like this after 2-3 years of use, but not within the first month. Sure would like a refund, or if the manufacturer says it’s just a one-off defect, it would certainly be nice to get one that works and doesn’t break.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack that LASTS
customer_reviews.text: 26000+ mAh is insane for a battery pack. I can go weeks without needing to charge this thing up. I can charge my phone from 0-100 like 10-15 times over. Anyone that travels, this will come up CLUTCH for you if you need a charge on the go. Precaution, this thing has some weight to it due to the large battery capacity so keep that in mind. What is also nice is that this has two micro-USB ports on here so you can use two cables to charge this battery pack faster. I have used my battery pack for over 3 years now and still has a very large battery capacity.
customer_reviews.author: K-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Power to spare and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and needed a battery pack with plenty of power. I chose the Anker PowerCore 26800 for it’s capacity and the fact that Anker makes excellent products. After a little over a year, I began having issues charging the battery pack. I contacted Anker, and after determining that there was indeed an issue with the battery pack, they promptly sent me a replacement. I have had nothing but excellent customer service from Anker. It’s because of this that I purchase Anker products and will continue to do so. An outstanding company!
customer_reviews.author: JBurdick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but worth its weight
customer_reviews.text: For a while now I've been surprised at the quality of Anker products for the price point. This time is no different. It "Rapid charges" my Essential PH-1 which usually uses a 45w type C wall charger. I haven't timed it yet but charge time doesn't seem too long. I typically can get 5-6 full charges on my phone off one battery pack charge. The pack also seems to have no difficulty charging off a small backpack solar panel charger (21w). All in all very happy, here to hoping for a long battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Klaymate

customer_reviews.title: TOO HEAVY for a portable charging bank
customer_reviews.text: WAYYYYYY TOO HEAVY for travels! I ordered another dual port USB charger less 1k-2k power bank for MUCHHHHHH lighter and opted to keep the lighter one instead. No one wants to carry a heavy brick to stay powered up during travels. Had it not been for the heavy weight of this charger, it would’ve been a winner. The one good thing about this charger are the dual inputs for charging to reduce the charge time. Still, it was much too heavy for me so back it went.
customer_reviews.author: JenInLA

customer_reviews.title: Great battery!
customer_reviews.text: This battery is extremely convenient. I pack it in my carryon luggage when I travel and it is as good as having a wall outlet for my phone and other USB charged devices. Although it stopped working after two years (outside of Anker's 18 month warranty), Anker clearly stands behind their product. After writing an initial review, I was contacted by the company directly and provided with a replacement battery despite being outside the warranty period. Fantastic customer service on top of a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Jones

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, but a great deal anyway!
customer_reviews.text: This thing will easily charge and iPad and two iPhones at the same time! I use this battery pack to keep my three kids happy in the back of the car during long road trips. It lacks enough power to keep two iPhones and an iPad fully charged during long 8-10hr road trips running whatever apps they want including Pokémon go (that can kill an iPhone in less than a hour). There is only two things that would make this better 1. If you could charge devices while you charge the pack. 2. Thunder bolt support (newer versions has this). If you can live with those short comings get it. Dollar for power this is the best bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Bergie

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: supere fast charging, I don’t know how long to charge the bank, but After it completed charge, it could last a long time. Maybe 10 times for iPhone 7. And it charger way faster than the original adapter. Love it. The only disadvantage is the bank is a little big and heavy to carry. Updated: After I used for about 2 months, it began not working as previously, it charges my iPhone very slow, and it take forever to fill up the bank. Now I barely used it.
customer_reviews.author: jmj family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Charger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to charge my Samsung Galaxy 9+ (with camera, GPS, and trail maps) to use while backpacking. It's AMAZING!!! With careful attention to my power consumption, I am able to hike for up to 7 days in the back country. On average, by the way, my daily requirements are about 10 hours of GPS, 150 HD photos, 30 minutes SIM card for text messages, and 15 minutes flashlight. I could go even further by reducing GPS, for example, but that hasn't been necessary.
customer_reviews.author: David Ross

customer_reviews.title: Don’t travel anywhere without it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t travel anywhere without this bad boy! I’ve had it for 3 years and seriously no complaints. This charge lasts for ages, it hasn’t weakened over time. It does take a bit to charge fully but it is a huge battery so I get why. It’s not so bulky that it’s cumbersome to take with me, fits no problem in my bags and backpacks. Plus the little pouch it comes with keeps the cords and the charger in it nicely. I recommend this to everyone I know, so if you’re thinking of getting it do it! Definitely would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity
customer_reviews.text: Product is a little heavy and longer than would fit in a pocket. I have a smaller (half the capacity) battery that I have been using for a couple of years. I bought this one because there are times that I am traveling with a partner and we are in a car and both need to charge our phones. Problem solved. If you purchase Anker's double charger, you can plug in both input charging channels at the same time and charge the battery in roughly half the time. If you have two fast chargers you can accomplish the same thing but that requires two AC sockets.
customer_reviews.author: EBW

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this. It is able to charge any USB device and does so far quicker than the USB 3.0 ports on any computer I've tested. The batter does take about 24 hours to charge from 0 to 100%, however once charged it can recharge my phone (iPhone Xs Max) 4 or 5 times and will charge the phone from 10% battery to 100% in approximately 1 hour. 10% to 80% in about 30 minutes. I bring this with me any time I travel and consider it to be an essential travel gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: It's a great power bank that has an insane amount of battery capacity which can charge my phone quite a few times before needing to be charged. I love that it has 2 charging ports to charge it twice as fast. My only complaint is that the ports are NOT quick charge ports so the charging speed of it is a lot slower than if I was to use the charger in my car. This isn't a problem tho as this is for emergencies only.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it takes this thing a while to get fully charged. But when i travel on the road it's prettyi mpressive. im able to charge my phone atleast nearly 3 times while on the road or out in the field working. I'd highly recommend it if youre working constantly and not always near an Outlet!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cell. It packs amazing amounts of power storage and capacity. I charge it up an average of once every six weeks....this is stored in my backpack and use it for my Droid Maxx2 and Garmin HR+ whenever I am not able to wall charge. Built durable and tough. I have the 21w solar charging panel as well....if you buy this product do not purchase the 26800 for it....I called customer service and they said the 20000 was best for charging from the panel. It however does not state the compatibility on the site. Love it love it. Oh..buy the 39w wall charger with duel USB. YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: wayfaringwarren

customer_reviews.title: Works great (with the proper charger that is)!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it came half charged so tried to charge it with my iphone chargers BUT they won't work. I then bought the Anker charger and now it charges fine and very quickly too. Wish they had specified that the battery pack needed a special charger to work properly but all's well that ends well. Good battery, charged two iphones, one ipad and a kindle paperwhite and still had half a full charge left.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Devitalis

customer_reviews.title: It's excellent! This is a great buy for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. It's size, it's power, the double charging...everything. I had one I got years ago that we left at a hotel (and they conveniently never found it), and I have bought a couple cheaper ones to try to replace it, however nothing has come close...until this! Finally, one that I can use multiple times over several days without having to recharge it once a day. I think it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great products and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth battery bank from Anker over the last 6 years. Bought this one for the serious charging sessions we need during music festivals and long outdoor trips to keep our cameras, GPS, and phones charged up. Charged up as quickly as our old 10000 mAh banks. Unfortunately our first unit had some issues, but Anker customer support was extremely awesome and got us a new unit immediately. First interaction we've had with their CS department, and we're even bigger Anker fans now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for a high power power bank at a good ...
customer_reviews.text: I havent used it extensively, as I havent traveled since buying it, but I have used it occasionally. So far, it is as advertised. It is a standard charger, nothing special, but then the price is what you expect for that. Highly recommended for a high power power bank at a good price. The dual charge feature will become useful when I travel, but I havent used it yet. It is a good size, though heavy, but thats to be expected based on its storage amount. Worth it for me, and comes with a little travel bag, which I keep the charging cables in also so it all stays neat in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good charger to have on the road
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Charges my cell phone super fast. In about an hour. Charges my phone about 5x before it needs a new charge. Which is usually about a week's worth of use for me. Cons: Takes super long to charge (with 1 charger) about 2 days. Too big for my pocket. It's better than the previous version but needs some major improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Solid customer service...product could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. Bought this in December and it already stopped fast charging my phone. Of course, it stopped working outside the return date. Don't make the mistake i did Update: Anker reached out to me through email and sent me an upgraded replacement at no cost to me. I would buy their products again just based on this service Update #2 It's been about 6 months since I received a replacement from anker. The charging bank stopped accepting a charge and won't get past 20% full. Reaching out to anker to see their response. Not sure I would buy this model again
customer_reviews.author: tom marshall

customer_reviews.title: My Must-Have Item! Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that I can recharge this twice as fast as other models that only offer one input. The output recharges for my cell are quick and numerous. It really works great for traveling or when staying with family members at the hospital for extended periods of time. My battery drains quickly due to sending out alot of medical updates. Also used this during weather emergencies and extended power outages. Truly so beneficial!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing charger that just keeps going!
customer_reviews.text: This charger has exceeded my wildest expectations! I fully charged my iPhone XR and have been using it to charge my Bluetooth headphones (10+ times so far) and it just keeps going on the initial charge! It is a tad bulky for travel but that is not unexpected for a charger of this power. I am becoming a huge fan of Anker products because of their quality and prices.
customer_reviews.author: Skrbevolo

customer_reviews.title: pain in the butt
customer_reviews.text: This battery has an "on" button that has to be pressed to start charging, the battery automatically turns off when there is no load. The problem is when i charge my Iphone and it reaches 100% the Anker battery turns off however the phone is still on using battery so i wake up to a cell phone that has been plugged in all night with 85%. The second problem is i keep the battery in my backpack with the charging cable hanging out the side, when i need to charge my phone or camera i have the take my backpack off and press the button on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Harlin

customer_reviews.title: ... charger I've bought now because the first was so useful. The first one I got was the smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Anker portable charger I've bought now because the first was so useful. The first one I got was the smaller version with only one USB port. Despite being smaller, it can fully charge my phone four times before needing to be recharged. This larger one is great because it can charge multiple devises at once, and it holds a charge comparable to the smaller. I haven't fully tested it out, but I charged three phones fully and it still had at least half of its charge left. Anker products are the best portable chargers I've ever experienced. Can't recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: luvdemhuskies

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a partable power beast
customer_reviews.text: I love these anker portable batteries. I started with a smaller battery and upgraded to this beast. It does what it says. My wife and I both can recharge our Galaxy 7s repeatedly with this thing. The weight is reasonable, if you hike or camp for days like us. One drawback of these batteries is it takes time to fully charge them, however this model addresses that issue by allowing you to charge with two plugs at the same time. Also, the provided cords are okay, but I highly recommend purchasing a pack of long (6ft) durable USB to micro USB cords to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Constitutional Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this charger for use during our Florida hurricane season when we are prone to lose power. I fully charged the Power Core and then never had the occasion to use it. Skip ahead a couple of months and I attempted to charge my ipad. No dice. Although the Power Core showed 4 blue lights it would not charge my device. I contacted customer service and reached a wonderful agent named Sophia who couldn't have been more helpful. She sent me a replacement almost immediately. Needless to say, I am a happy camper and highly recommend this Anker Power Core and Sophia!
customer_reviews.author: FlamingoLee

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Trash
customer_reviews.text: This is the most disappointing purchase. I purchased this back in September for an upcoming backpacking trip in South America (always with appropriate converters.) It worked on the trip in October. And then when I used it again for a trip to Switzerland in December it stopped fully charging. Or would charge my iPhone X once then die. I paid 70 dollars thinking I’d be able to use it for at least a couple years. Used it for two weeks. I’ll never buy another Anker product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: It was great when it was holding 26800mAh.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great battery pack. I really like it because it holds so much power to it. But recently the batter isn't that great anymore. It only hold charges for 4-5 charges on my iPhone XS Max. I think I should be getting more than that. The charging was fast and it gave me a quick charge on my iPhone. To charge the unit itself, it takes around 6 hours to finish, I'm not complaining because that is very quick in my opinion. Overall it was a great battery when it was newer. The charging power is great. The only downside is how bulky it is. The battery life lasted for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ER Fukuda

customer_reviews.title: TRAVELING ESSENTIAL MUST!
customer_reviews.text: I am always going to be a fan of the Anker portable batteries. Definitely an essential when traveling, even though phone batteries are becoming better. You can charge a bunch of other things that has a USB cable charger. Great on the go, has some weight, but not extremely heavy, 3 charging port making it easy to share with others or charge multiple items. Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Tine

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This charger lasts a long, long time. Depending on your individual use, it can last for several months before having to recharge it. And to charge the charger itself ...if you use both charging cables that come with it and plug them in at the same time, it charges fairly quickly. I loved this charger so much I bought another one to ensure I always have a charged charger. It comes with 2 android cables but will certainly work with an IPhone as well as long as you have your own cable with a USB on the end. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dellyn

customer_reviews.title: I'm always on the go and I ride the bus and my bike every day so being able to know I have a full day even if I didn't charge the night before is amazing. I'm heavy on my phone all day with ...
customer_reviews.text: This battery is a beast. It takes a bit of time to charge it but thankfully you can charge it with 2 cords at a time and this greatly speeds up the prosses. I'm always on the go and I ride the bus and my bike every day so being able to know I have a full day even if I didn't charge the night before is amazing. I'm heavy on my phone all day with this plugged in whenever I can. Sometimes I don't charge it for three days, I don't know actual times.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Good battery.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Aug 9, 2017. As of December i barely get 3-4 charged on my phone before it's dead. Isn't lasting through 3 days. It started out great *update* Anker provided me with a new unit and it does hold up. Good product. Like being able to be away from outlets and not having to search for a place to plug in when I'm on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Mayhall

customer_reviews.title: Heavier Than I Imagined, But PERFECT For Traveling
customer_reviews.text: The power bank is everything it claims to be. My only complaint (and I take full responsibility) is that the unit is WAY heavier and much larger in size than I was anticipating. I wanted something that, as a college student who is always on the go, could throw in my bookbag and take with me. With books, etc already in my bag, the power bank just adds too much unwanted extra weight. HOWEVER, with that being said, I travel a lot - internationally and such - and the power bank is the perfect solution for extra-long flights where you may not have access to re-charging your devices.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: I brought this at Christmas time. It is 2 months old today. It will not hold charge. I have a 20,000 one 13,000 one , 3 or 4 lipsticks chargers, earbuds ,15 or 20 thinks I have brought . They are all 5 stars. I think I just got a bad one. I recommend anker to people all the time, they have great products.
customer_reviews.author: kevin english

customer_reviews.title: Anker portable charger
customer_reviews.text: I've got a smaller unit of the Anker portable charger and liked it enough that I purchased this larger unit. It's a great backup for charging up phones when you're not near an outlet. I use this when camping, boating, all day bike rides, or if the power goes out and my phone is low on battery. You can charge this battery up via AC or hooked to a solar panel.
customer_reviews.author: Remnant

customer_reviews.title: It's a BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for extended camping trips and times where I travel for work and am without convenient charging access. It is a BEAST. It's heavy and pretty large, but for the capacity, I would imagine it needs to be. The thing is... it works. It is well built, comes with a nice padded mesh bag and cable. The bag is a huge bonus as my old charger got banged up and the cord mangled just from being in my purse (it wasn't an Anker). This one doesn't have that issue at all. I was weary of whether or not to get a portable charger this size and am definitely happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Naturally Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cell phone related purchases
customer_reviews.text: I had a bunch of portable chargers and this crushes them all. I even have a portable charger that can (and has been used to) jump a car, and I like this charger for my phone better! The battery pack itself charges very quickly and the battery life on it lasts very long. This paired with Anker charging cords I bought is one of the best purchases I have ever made for cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It works great.  Huge capacity!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have used it countless times on camping trips, vacations, ect. It really works great. When i did have a slight issue the customer service was incredible. Rochelle in customer service really made me feel like a valued customer. 10/10 will continue to buy products from Anker without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Grobie

customer_reviews.title: Great powerbank
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use this powerbank mostly at work to keep my phone charged since my phone drains faster when it tries to find reception. I leave it in my locker and it lasts me about 2 weeks in between charges with 25% remaining when I take it home to recharge. It does take a while to charge it though even with 2 chargers attached
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Aguirre

product_meta.title: Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger, 26800mAh External Battery with Dual Input Port and Double-Speed Recharging, 3 USB Ports for iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy, Android and Other Smart Devices
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackModel number: A1277

PowerCore 26800
The Fast-Recharging Colossal-Capacity Portable Charger

From ANKER, America's Leading Charging Brand
Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology
50 million+ happy users and counting

Power For Days
Get freedom from your wall for over a week. PowerCore 26800 provides almost 10 iPhone 8 charges, 6.5 Samsung Galaxy S8 charges or multiple charges for almost all tablets and other USB devices.

Double-Speed Recharge
With dual input ports and a max input of 4A, a full charge takes just over 6 hours—twice as fast as a standard portable charger. Recharge for a night; charge for an entire week. 

Superior Safety
Anker’s MultiProtect technology combines surge protection, short circuit prevention, and more to keep you and your devices safe.

Input
5V ⎓ 4A (5V ⎓ 2A Max Per Port)

Output
5V ⎓ 6A (5V ⎓ 3A Max Per Port)

Notes
Recharging via a single port will result in slower speeds. For the fastest recharging speeds, a 4A (2A+2A) input is required. (Wall charger sold separately)
Use the included Micro-USB cable, your original cable or a third-party certified one (such as MFi); AC adapter not included.
Please use an MFi certified Lightning cable (not included) to charge Apple devices.
Compatible with most USB-charged devices, including iPhone 8 / X / XS / XS Max / XR (Lightning cable required), Android smartphones and tablets (including the Nexus 7), USB-C MacBooks / iPad (USB A to C cable required).
Not compatible with the iPod nano, iPod Classic; Not for devices with an input below 50mA (e.g. some Bluetooth headsets and GPS devices).
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by our leading technology.
Colossal capacity: 26800mAh of power charges most phones over 6 times, tablets at least 2 times and any other USB device multiple times.

High-Speed Charging: 3 USB output ports equipped with Anker's PowerIQ and Voltage Boost technology ensure high-speed charging for three devices—simultaneously (Not compatible with Qualcomm Quick Charge).

Recharge 2X Faster: Dual Micro USB (20W) input offers recharge speeds up to twice as fast as standard portable chargers—a full recharge takes just over 6 hours while using both input ports (wall charger not included).

What you get: Power core 26800, 2X Micro USB cable, Travel Pouch, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month and friendly customer service. Usb-c cable and Lightning cable for iPhone/ iPad sold separately.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars12,530 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
